unnormalised: Konnen tor mhaka vicharlem, "Mumbai-nt ailea disa ek sadharan kiranyache dukonant kitle kharch yeta?" Tor, bhai, tem tumi koidhe dukonantlean ghethat ani tumi kitem gheta tantun khub asa! Eka lhan kiranyache dukonant thoddea vostun khatir zoxem 1 kg piyav, 1 liter dud ani zait zalear Parle-G pachett ₹250-₹300 lagu yetat. Punn tem fokot ekdom unnem, tumi zannat?
normalised: Konnen tor mhaka vicharlem, "Mumbaiant atanchem sadarann kiranyaanchem kitlo kharch yeta?" Arey, bhai, tem khuim vikte ghetai ani kitem ghetai tanchecher zaite pavtya aasa! Ek kilogram kande, ek liter duddh, ani P-a-r-l-e-G-achem packet ghachem sarke vostunche lagim thoddem kiranya store vochonk rupee donshae pachas thavn rupee teen shae zatat. Punn tem fukt bare minimum, zaana?

unnormalised: Zoxem tumi D-Mart vo Reliance Fresh-k voitat, tumi adhik diunk toyar ravat. Khas korun tumi videshi vostu vo organic bhaji ghevtat zalear. Toxench basket ₹500-₹700 lagunk xakta. Ani mhaka weekend-anche udkhatto kaddunk laupache naka! Tem ₹2000 voir vochunk xakta, khas korun tumi family-chea khatir ghevtat zalear.
normalised: Zor tum D-M-a-r-t vo Reliance Fresh sarke fantye supermarket-ak vhetai, tor zaithe diunk assa. Khas kerun zor tum import kel'li vostu vo organic bhajipalo ghetai. Ek sarke basket-ak rupee paanch shae thavn rupee saat shae zatat. Ani weekend-ache velyar thodde velya lagun shuruvat korunk naka! Tem rupee don hazaarache ponch korta, khas kerun tum sogllea familiche lagun ghetai.

unnormalised: Magir asa local markets, zoxem Crawford Market. Tumkam thoddea borea deals mellonk xaktat, punn tumkam khub bhaji korchi poddtoli! Tumkam 5 kg ambe ₹400-ak mellonk xaktat, punn gunnachem khub barem vo vaitt zaunk xakta. Toxench, Mumbai traffic-an thaim vochunk ani parat yeunk khub kharch ani vell vochta.
normalised: Ani Crawford Market sarke local bazaar-an asa. Tumak thoim bare deal milta, punn tumak bargenaachi zoruri asa! Tum paanch kilogram ambe rupee char shache lagim vikte gheunk sakta, punn tanchi quality bore ki vait te nakki sangunk zaina. Ani Mumbai-che trafficant thoim vochun ani porot yeyunk zaite kharche ani vellaache guantavanukaasa.

unnormalised: Dekhun, ek sadharan kiranyache dukon? Hanv mhanto zalear ₹300 te ₹2000 modlea kharchent, tumchea zarupeak ani sondeak dharun. Ani auto-rickshaw vo petrol-acho kharch visrunk naka, boss! Toxench, ailea disa dor vaddun asa; kimti dor disa voir choddta dista!
normalised: Mhunnun, sadarann kiranyaanchem kharch? Huen mhuntai rupee teen shae thavn rupee don hazaar modhem, tumachi goroz ani ruchicher dhavun. Ani auto-rickshawache fare vo petrol-achem kharch visrunk naka, boss! Ani inflation-an zore diunk lagle dissa divas; bhav divas diwas vadhtat ditha!
